name: SaaS Pegasus
description: SaaS Pegasus is a starter project template that helps you create and deploy SaaS applications with Python and Django. While SaaS Pegasus is — at least for now — a closed-source, proprietary product, it is built on top of a vast Open Source ecosystem. Adopting the Open Source Pledge felt like a good way to give back to the developers whose work has made Pegasus possible.
